feed.title: Mount Carleton (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Mount Carleton (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:53 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to ice pellets mixed with snow near noon then to freezing rain this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow or ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to ice pellets mixed with freezing rain late this evening then to snow after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain or rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or rain. High plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Showers. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023
